response.overview: The film explores the thoughts of those who remain in the village, their journey from rural poverty, seemingly endless, from generation to generation. Ambitious people push forward, but every step of the journey seems to lead them back to the same place. Nong Hin is their starting point and their destination.
response.title: Road to Nong Hin Village

crew.name: ลักษณาพร ทาระพันธ์
crew.original_name: ลักษณาพร ทาระพันธ์
